You're in for a treat! Costa Rican cuisine is a delicious blend of Spanish, African, and indigenous influences. Gallo pinto and empanadas are definitely must-try dishes.

Regarding dietary restrictions and preferences, EcoAdventure International is happy to accommodate special requests. They understand that food is an essential part of the travel experience, and they want to ensure that everyone has a great time, regardless of their dietary needs.

**Vegetarian and Vegan Options:**

* EcoAdventure International can provide vegetarian and vegan options for meals, including breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
* They work with their accommodations and local suppliers to ensure that vegetarian and vegan options are available and delicious.
* If you have specific dietary requirements, they'll make sure to communicate with the chefs and kitchen staff to prepare meals that meet your needs.

**Gluten-Free Options:**

* EcoAdventure International can accommodate gluten-free dietary requirements, including providing gluten-free bread, pasta, and baked goods.
* They'll work with local bakeries and suppliers to source gluten-free ingredients and ensure that meals are prepared safely.

**Other Dietary Restrictions:**

* If you have other dietary restrictions, such as dairy-free, nut-free, or soy-free, EcoAdventure International will do their best to accommodate your needs.
* They'll work with you to understand your requirements and make necessary arrangements with their accommodations and suppliers.

**Communication is Key:**

* It's essential to inform EcoAdventure International about your dietary restrictions or preferences when booking your trip.
* They'll ask about any dietary requirements during the booking process, so be sure to mention any special needs or requests.
* If you have specific questions or concerns, don't hesitate to reach out to them directly.

EcoAdventure International is committed to providing an inclusive and enjoyable experience for all their guests. They'll work with you to ensure that your dietary needs are met, so you can focus on enjoying the surfing, hiking, and cultural experiences that Costa Rica has to offer.

Now, are you ready to start planning your "Surf and Turf" adventure with EcoAdventure International?
